attributes.action: Posthumouusly  the  UK  Parliament  should  pardon the conviction  of  Steve  Thorburn, Sunderland  Grocer,   for his gallant  defence of peoples  democratic choice - to purchase  in  Imperial  or  metric  measurement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Posthumouusly,  the  UK  Parliament  should  pardon the conviction  of  Steve  Thorburn, Sunderland  Grocer ( & 4 un-named others ),  for his gallant  defence of peoples  democratic choice - to purchase goods in  Imperial  or  metric  measurement. The  European  union  should  be  requested  to  apologise  for  their  stance  also.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
